translation.it: - Vieni qui. - Te la ricordi, Bella?

translation.en: BELLA: My Lucas blanket!
I wanted to try something. OLIVIA: Yeah.
This was her favorite thing when she was little.
translation.it: Questa era la sua cosa preferita quando era piccola.

translation.en: But after all she's been through, I don't know if she'll remember.
translation.it: Ma dopo tutto ciò che ha passato, non so se se la ricorderà.

translation.en: Bella, do you want...
A tiny piece of cheese. ...a tiny piece of cheese?
translation.it: - Un pezzettino di formaggio. - ...un pezzettino di formaggio?

translation.en: She does remember.
OLIVIA: She's an amazing dog.
She really is.
BELLA: I was really home
with Lucas, and Olivia, too.
I was where I needed to be.
BELLA: And Big Kitten was where she needed to be.
translation.it: E Gattina Grande era dove doveva stare.

translation.en: BELLA: I finally understood
that the invisible leash that led me to Lucas
translation.it: che il guinzaglio invisibile che mi aveva portata da Lucas

translation.en: was made of love.
He was my person.
And I was his dog.
translation.it: E io ero il suo cane.
